content.description: An object of mass <math alttext="0.5 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> is given an initial velocity and then slides across a horizontal surface. The object experiences a resistive force that is a function of velocity. The velocity <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the object as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext="v of t equals alpha e raised to the negative beta t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="alpha equals 2 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="beta equals 3 seconds to the negative 1 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mtext> s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the net force, in newtons, exerted on the object as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 6 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 3 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the negative 3 t power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 e raised to the negative 3 t power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 over 3 times, open parenthesis 1 minus e raised to the negative 3 t power, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 3 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
